name: Hoe Release
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
Requirements Must be considered connected to a target.
With the power of magic, the bolt connected to the target is released, causing you to become disconnected from the target, losing the connected trait. This release causes the target to bleed, gaining 1d4 Persistent Bleed damage.
Level 9: Increase Persistent Bleed damage to 2d4
Level 13: Increase Persistent Bleed damage to 3d4
Level 20: Increase Persistent Bleed damage to 4d4
